UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that may represent a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Phytohormone treatment induces generation of cryptic peptides with antimicrobial activity in the Moss Physcomitrella patens.
Literature.Author: Fesenko I, Azarkina R, Kirov I, Kniazev A, Filippova A, Grafskaia EN, Lazarev VN, Zgoda V, Butenko I, Bukato O, Lyapina I, Nazarenko D, Elansky S, Mamaeva A, Ivanov V, Govorun V

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli K12 MG1655(MIC=16µg/ml),Bacillus subtilis 168 HT(MIC=32µg/ml)
